nodes.text: A male member of House Malreaux served as the ninth count in the history of the house, which was one of the richest families on the planet Vjun. Whilst he was count, the individual owned the FIII Footman droid Fidelis who created the recipe for the dish known as Crêpes Malreaux for him and continued to serve it for his family long after the count's death.
The count was first mentioned in the novel Yoda: Dark Rendezvous which was written by Sean Stewart and released in 2004.
